required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long-term Immunogenicity of the HIV gp120-NefTat/AS01B Vaccine (GSK SB732461)
clinical_study.official_title: Long-term Immunogenicity of the HIV gp120-NefTat/AS01B Vaccine (GSK SB732461)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the long-term persistence of binding antibody responses against V1V2 and gp120 in subjects who were vaccinated with the envelope glycoprotein 120 (gp120)-negative factor (Nef)Tat/ Adjuvant System 01B (AS01B) (GSKSB732461) vaccine candidate. Other immune parameters like the HIV-specific cluster of differentiation (CD4+) T cell and CD8+ T cell responses will also be evaluated.

detailed_description.textblock: GlaxoSmithKline (GSK) contributes to the public-private pox-protein partnership (P5) which is currently assessing the safety, immunogenicity and clinical efficacy of a prime-boost regimen aimed at preventing HIV transmission (http://www.hvtn.org/en.html). The booster component of the candidate vaccine used in this program consists of two gp120 clade C proteins administered with an adjuvant. In order to inform the selection of the adjuvant in future studies, data on long-term persistence of immunity after vaccination with gp120/AS01 would prove useful. The present study was designed to address this question using a cohort of volunteers vaccinated several years ago with a candidate vaccine containing gp120 and AS01.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Descriptive mono-centric study with one single group.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with anti-V1V2 Immunoglobulin G (IgG) and subtypes IgG1, IgG2, IgG3 and IgG4 seropositive status
primary_outcome.description: A seronegative subject will be defined as a subject whose antibody concentration is below the cut-off value of the assay. A seropositive subject is a subject whose antibody concentration is greater than or equal to the cut-off value of the assay.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with anti-V1V2 IgG and subtypes IgG1, IgG2, IgG3 and IgG4 binding antibody seropositive status
primary_outcome.time_frame: At Day 0 historical time point of PRO-HIV-002
primary_outcome.description: A seronegative subject will be defined as a subject whose antibody concentration is below the cut-off value of the assay. A seropositive subject is a subject whose antibody concentration is greater than or equal to the cut-off value of the assay.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with anti-V1V2 IgG and subtypes IgG1, IgG2, IgG3 and IgG4 binding antibody seropositive status
primary_outcome.time_frame: At Day 182 historical time point of PRO-HIV-002
primary_outcome.description: A seronegative subject will be defined as a subject whose antibody concentration is below the cut-off value of the assay. A seropositive subject is a subject whose antibody concentration is greater than or equal to the cut-off value of the assay.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with anti-V1V2 IgG and subtypes IgG1, IgG2, IgG3 and IgG4 binding antibody seropositive status
primary_outcome.time_frame: At Day 672 historical time point of PRO-HIV-002
primary_outcome.description: A seronegative subject will be defined as a subject whose antibody concentration is below the cut-off value of the assay. A seropositive subject is a subject whose antibody concentration is greater than or equal to the cut-off value of the assay.

primary_outcome.measure: Anti-V1V2 IgG (and subtypes IgG1, IgG2, IgG3, IgG4) antibody concentrations
primary_outcome.description: Antibody concentrations will be presented as Geometric Mean Concentrations (GMCs) as measured by the Binding Antibody Multiplex Assay (BAMA) and expressed in mean fluorescence intensity (MFI).

primary_outcome.measure: Anti-V1V2 IgG (and subtypes IgG1, IgG2, IgG3, IgG4) antibody concentrations
primary_outcome.time_frame: At Day 0 historical time point of PRO-HIV-002
primary_outcome.description: Antibody concentrations will be presented as Geometric Mean Concentrations (GMCs) as measured by the Binding Antibody Multiplex Assay (BAMA) and expressed in mean fluorescence intensity (MFI).

primary_outcome.measure: Anti-V1V2 IgG (and subtypes IgG1, IgG2, IgG3, IgG4) antibody concentrations
primary_outcome.time_frame: At Day 182 historical time point of PRO-HIV-002
primary_outcome.description: Antibody concentrations will be presented as Geometric Mean Concentrations (GMCs) as measured by the Binding Antibody Multiplex Assay (BAMA) and expressed in mean fluorescence intensity (MFI).

primary_outcome.measure: Anti-V1V2 IgG (and subtypes IgG1, IgG2, IgG3, IgG4) antibody concentrations
primary_outcome.time_frame: At Day 672 historical time point of PRO-HIV-002
primary_outcome.description: Antibody concentrations will be presented as Geometric Mean Concentrations (GMCs) as measured by the Binding Antibody Multiplex Assay (BAMA) and expressed in mean fluorescence intensity (MFI).

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of Human Immunodeficiency Virus type 1 (HIV-1) specific cluster of differentiation-4 (CD4+) T cells expressing cytokine markers
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At Year 14 and Day 0, Day 98, Day 672 historical time points of PRO-HIV-002
secondary_outcome.description: Assessed cytokines include: cluster of differentiation-40 lingand (CD40-L), Interleukin-2 (IL2), Tumour Necrosis Factor-alpha (TNF-α), Interferon-gamma (INF-γ), by Intracellular cytokine staining (ICS).

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of Human Immunodeficiency Virus type 1 (HIV-1) specific CD8+ T cells expressing cytokine markers
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At Year 14 and Day 0, Day 182, Day 672 historical time points of PRO-HIV-002
secondary_outcome.description: Assessed cytokines include: CD40-L, IL2, TNF-α, INF-γ, by ICS.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of vaccine responders for HIV-1-specific CD4+ T-cells expressing cytokine markers
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At Year 14 and Day 0, Day 98, Day 672 historical time points of PRO-HIV-002
secondary_outcome.description: Assessed cytokines include: CD40-L, IL2, TNF-α, INF-γ, by ICS.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of vaccine responders for HIV-1-specific CD8+ T-cells expressing cytokine markers
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At Year 14 and Day 0, Day 98, Day 672 historical time points of PRO-HIV-002
secondary_outcome.description: Assessed cytokines include: CD40-L, IL2, TNF-α, INF-γ, by ICS.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with anti-gp 120 IgG (and subtypes IgG1, IgG2, IgG3, IgG4) binding antibody seropositive status
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At Year 14 and Day 0, Day 182, Day 672 historical time points of PRO-HIV-002
secondary_outcome.description: A seronegative subject will be defined as a subject whose antibody concentration is below the cut-off value of the assay. A seropositive subject is a subject whose antibody concentration is greater than or equal to the cut-off value of the assay.

secondary_outcome.measure: Anti-gp120 IgG (and subtypes IgG1, IgG2, IgG3, IgG4) antibody concentrations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At Year 14 and Day 0, Day 182, Day 672 historical time points of PRO-HIV-002
secondary_outcome.description: Antibody concentrations will be presented as Geometric Mean Concentrations (GMCs) as measured by the Binding Antibody Multiplex Assay (BAMA) and expressed in MFI.

arm_group.description: Healthy HIV uninfected volunteers who participated in study PRO HIV-002 between February 2003 and February 2005 and who were vaccinated with at least 3 doses of the GSKSB732461 vaccine candidate.

intervention.description: Blood samples will be taken during the single study visit at Year 14 for the assessment of: HIV testing, antibody determination, cell mediated immune (CMI) responses and exploratory characterisation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who, in the opinion of the investigator, can and will comply with the requirements of the protocol.
- Written informed consent obtained from the subject prior to performing any study specific procedure.
- A subject who has received at least 3 doses of the gp120-NefTat/AS01B (GSKSB732461) vaccine candidate in GSK Biologicals-sponsored PRO HIV-002 study.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Use of any investigational or non-registered product during 30 days prior to study enrolment.
- History of HIV-1 or HIV-2 infection.
- Participation to another clinical trial of an investigational HIV vaccine between study PRO HIV-002 and the present study.
- Chronic administration of immunosuppressants or other immune-modifying drugs during the period starting one month preceding this study. For corticosteroids, this will mean prednisone higher than or equal to (≥) 20 mg/day . Inhaled and topical steroids are allowed.
- Administration of cytotoxic medication within 6 months preceding this study.
- History of daily, long-term immunosuppressive medication between study PRO HIV-002 and the present study.
- Administration of immunoglobulins and/or any blood products during the period starting 3 months before enrolment.
- Any confirmed or suspected immunosuppressive or immunodeficient condition other than HIV disease, based on medical history and physical examination between study PRO HIV-002 and the present study.
- Past administration of an investigational vaccine containing AS01 other than the gp120-NefTat/AS01B (GSKSB732461) vaccine administered in PRO HIV-002 study.

patient_data.ipd_description: Patient-level data for this study will be made available through www.clinicalstudydatarequest.com following the timelines and process described on this site.
